title: Real interest rate and investment spending

content.question: Based on the table above, what will happen to the real interest rate in the loanable funds market and private investment spending in plant and equipment?

choices.label: The real interest rate will increase, and private investment spending will increase.
The real interest rate will increase, and private investment spending will decrease.
The real interest rate will decrease, and private investment spending will decrease.
The real interest rate will decrease, and private investment spending will increase.
The real interest rate will increase, and private investment spending will not change.

content.answer: The real interest rate will increase, and private investment spending will decrease.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
